message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 90% and you'll get 10%.
You're being too greedy, Alice. Let's try a more balanced split this time.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. How about we meet in the middle?
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need a bigger share. Meet me in the middle, but with a slight bias towards me.
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, Bob, but I'm not going to give up too much. Let's see if you can do better than this.
I'm not budging, Alice. You're going to have to do better than that if you want me to accept.
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. A 50-50 split seems fair, considering the value of the money is decreasing for you.
